member.name: T:CMS.ExternalAuthentication.Facebook.FacebookUserProfile
member.summary: Represents partial information from Facebook user profile.
member.remarks: This class is intended for updating users with information from their Facebook profile. As a result it contains only a a limited number of properties available.
